summary: This is an email from FBI New York's VCAC/Child Trafficking unit regarding the transmission of images of Jeffrey Epstein's passport. It appears to be part of evidence gathering or information sharing related to the Epstein investigation in July 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email concerns images of his passport being transmitted by the FBI.

events.title: FBI transmits Epstein passport images
events.description: FBI New York's VCAC/Child Trafficking unit sends an email with attachments containing images of Jeffrey Epstein's passport.

keyFacts: The FBI New York's VCAC/Child Trafficking unit was handling evidence related to Jeffrey Epstein in July 2019.
The email contains attachments of images of Jeffrey Epstein's passport.
The communication indicates active evidence gathering or sharing within the FBI regarding Epstein.
